Package src.atm.account

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.atm.account.Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminAccount, BankAccount

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the framework and methods for creating and utilizing different types of accounts.

    This class cannot be instantiated.
    Version:
    01/18/2018
    Author:
    Joshua Ciffer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Account> ACCOUNT_MAP
      Provides means of storage and retrieval of accounts based on their account number.
      (package private) int ACCOUNT_NUMBER
      Unique 6 digit number for identifying an account.
      (package private) java.lang.String accountHistory
      Log of all transaction history and account changes.
      (package private) java.lang.String accountName
      The account holder's name.
      (package private) Pin accountPin
      The account's 4 digit PIN.
      (package private) static java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME
      Provides the date and time formatted for use in recording account history.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Account​(java.lang.String accountName, Pin accountPin)
      Constructor called by subclasses that creates an account with the user's name, 4 digit PIN, and account history.

    • Field Detail

      • ACCOUNT_MAP

        private static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Account> ACCOUNT_MAP
        Provides means of storage and retrieval of accounts based on their account number.

      • DATE_TIME

        static final java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME
        Provides the date and time formatted for use in recording account history. Example: 01/18/2017 8:58 PM.

      • ACCOUNT_NUMBER

        final int ACCOUNT_NUMBER
        Unique 6 digit number for identifying an account.

      • accountName

        java.lang.String accountName
        The account holder's name.

      • accountPin

        Pin accountPin
        The account's 4 digit PIN.

      • accountHistory

        java.lang.String accountHistory
        Log of all transaction history and account changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        Account​(java.lang.String accountName,
        Pin accountPin)
        Constructor called by subclasses that creates an account with the user's name, 4 digit PIN, and account history. The account history for all of accounts starts with an entry with the date and time the account was created. When the account is created, it is added to the account map.
        Parameters:
        accountName - - The account holder's name.
        accountPin - - The account's 4 digit PIN.
        accountHistory - - A log of all transaction history and account changes.

    • Method Detail

      • GENERATE_ACCOUNT_NUMBER

        private static final int GENERATE_ACCOUNT_NUMBER​()
        Generates a random 6 digit account number that is currently not in use by any accounts in the account map.

        This method cannot be overridden.
        Returns:
        accountNumber - Unique 6 digit integer.

      • GET_ACCOUNT

        public static final Account GET_ACCOUNT​(int accountNumber,
                                        java.lang.String accountPin)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.lang.NullPointerException
        Retrieves an account from the account map with a specified account number. The method also checks to make sure the correct PIN has been entered.

        This method cannot be overridden.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - - The account to be returned.
        accountPin - - The account's PIN.
        Returns:
        Returns the account with the given login credentials.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an incorrect PIN is entered.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if an account with the given account number cannot be found or does not exist.

      • ACCOUNT_EXISTS

        public static final boolean ACCOUNT_EXISTS​(int accountNumber)
                                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Checks the account map to see if an account with the given account number has been created.

        This method cannot be overridden.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - - The account number to check for.
        Returns:
        True - Returns true if an account with the given account number has been found in the account map.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if an account with the given account number cannot be found or does not exist.

      • changeAccountPin

        public final void changeAccountPin​(java.lang.String oldPin,
                                   java.lang.String newPin,
                                   java.lang.String confirmPin)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Changes the PIN of the account the method is invoked on. User needs to provide their current PIN to authenticate.

        This method cannot be overridden.
        Parameters:
        oldPin - - The current PIN.
        newPin - - The new PIN.
        confirmPin - - The new PIN entered again for confirmation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the current PIN is incorrect, or the new PIN is not valid, or if the new PIN and confirm PIN do not match.

      • closeAccount

        public final void closeAccount​(java.lang.String accountPin)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Closes the account that the method is invoked on. User needs to provide their current PIN to authenticate.

        This method cannot be overridden.
        Parameters:
        accountPin - - The user's PIN.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the PIN is incorrect.

      • GET_ACCOUNT_MAP

        public static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Account> GET_ACCOUNT_MAP​()
        Returns an instance of the account map.

        This method is only accessible from within src.atm.account. This method cannot be overridden.
        Returns:
        A reference to the account map.

      • equals

        public abstract boolean equals​(java.lang.Object account)
        Checks the content of two accounts to see if they are equal.

        This method must be implemented.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        account - - The account to test equality with.
        Returns:
        True - If the accounts are equal.
        False - If the accounts are not equal.

        public abstract java.lang.String toString​()
        Returns a string representation of the content of this account.

        This method must be implemented.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of all of the data contained in this account.
